mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Elbert E. Weddle, Until he reached 21 years of age 11.28.1908
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Elbert E. Weddle, Until he reached 21 years of age 11.28.1908 Hattie M. Weddle, Until she reached 21 years of age 11.28.1908 Posey C. Until she reached 21 years of age 04.20.1911 and Lida S. Weddle, Until 08.25.1912 when she reached 21 years of age Cyrenae E. Weddle, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 7, page 503, of the Floyd County Circuit Court
